name: Home Alone 2: Lost in New York
name_original: Home Alone 2: Lost in New York
description:
Home Alone 2: Lost in New York is an arcade game developed by Capstone. It was originally released in 1992. Capstone published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play Home Alone 2: Lost in New York on PC.
It was scored by Mark Van Hecke.
